pages.text: 26|207|hyeonseeseo jeulgyeossdeon hyanglag-i geu deul-ege yuyonghaji anihadeola
26|208|hananim-i gyeong-gojaleul bonaessdeon go-euldeul-eul myeolmangke hayeo
26|209|gyohun-i doedolog hayeoss-eudoe u lineun gyeolko geudeul-eul beolham-e budangha ji ani haessnola
26|210|satan-i geugeos-eul gajigo o ji ani haess-eumyeo
26|211|geugeos-eun geudeul-ege jeoghabha ji anihago geuleohge hal neunglyeogdo eobs nola
26|212|geudeul-eun geugeos-eul deudneun gi hoejochado je-oedoeeo iss-eossnola
26|213|hananim oee daleun sin-eul sung baehaji balla geuleohji anihamyeon neo huido beol-eul badneun ja jung-e issge doe lila
26|214|geudaeui chincheogdeul-ege gyeong-gohala
26|215|midneunja jung-eseo geudaeleul ttaleu neun ja-egeneun geudaeui nalgaeleul najchula
26|216|geudeul-i geudaeege geoyeoghanda myeon illeogalodoe sillo naneun neohuiga haenghaneun modeun il-e chaeg-im-i eobsnola
26|217|jeonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasin bun ege uijihala
26|218|geubun-eun yebaehagi wihae hollo seo issneun geudaeleul bogo gyesimyeo
26|219|geudaega eopdeulyeo yebaehaneun ja deul jung-e iss-eul ttaedo bogo gyesinani
26|220|sillo geubun-eun deul-eusimgwa asim eulo chungmanhasim-ila
26|221|illeogalodoe satandeul-i nugu ege naelyeooneunji neohuiege illeojuliyo
26|222|geudeul-eun geojishago saaghan modeun jadeul-ege naelyeo ol ppun-ila
26|223|geudeul-eun gwileul giul-ina geudeuldaedasuneun geojishaneun jadeul-ila
26|224|siindeul-eun saagsog-eseo bang hwanghamyeo geudeul-eul ttaleuneun jadeul-ila
26|225|geudeul-i modeun gyegog-eseo iseong-eul ilhgo banghwanghaneun geos-eul neohuineun boji anhhaessneunyo
26|226|geudeul-eun geudeul-i haenghajido anihan geos-eul malhago issnola

26|227|geuleona mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghamyeo hangsang hananim-eul yeom-wonhago baghaeleul bad-eun huedo seuseuloleul bo hohaneun jadeul-eun je-oela saaghan haeng wileul jeojileun jadeul-eun geudeul-i dol-a gal choehuui unmyeong-i mueos-inji alge doenila
